name: Marble Hopper (rythnyx)
description:
Marble Hopper - A Platformer where you progressively move deeper through world portal to... somewhere.

Made for Ludum Dare 48. Theme was Deeper and Deeper.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D to Move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left mouse click to interact with objects
  • Space to Jump
  • Shift to Sprint
  • O should release your mouse from the game screen if it is stuck to it
  • Numpad Minus if you want to view the name of the current world you are in

IMPORTANT: If you can't interact with the buttons, try pressing "O", aligning your cursor with the red dot at the center, and then press "O" again. This should hopefully realign things to get interactive buttons working

Credits to Sebastian Lague whose portal youtube video I heavily expanded upon.

Didn't quite make it to completion even for the Jam but by the end I had all the components to flesh out some worlds more quickly.
